project.name: ClimaFlow
project.description: A responsive web application that fetches and displays real-time weather data using OpenWeatherMap API.
features: Display of temperature, humidity, wind speed, weather condition and icon
Graceful error handling for API failures or invalid cities

functions.fetchWeatherData: Make GET request using fetch(), parse JSON response
functions.updateDOM: Inject parsed weather data into UI elements
functions.handleErrors: Catch network or API errors and display message
functions.autoRefresh: Set interval to re-fetch data every 10 minutes

readme.installation: Steps to clone and run locally
